radiographic_examinations.findings: Hilar lymphadenopathy with a fine reticular pattern on both sides and mild filling of the retrosternal air space.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Contrast-enhanced computed tomography (CT) of the chest
radiographic_examinations.findings: Pleural effusions in both lungs, mild adenopathy, increased interstitial markings, and increased vascular markings.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in mediastinal adenopathy seen on a subsequent CT scan, along with a small pericardial effusion and widespread interlobular septal thickening.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate left ventricular systolic dysfunction, right ventricular dilatation with moderate-to-severe global hypokinesia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Another echocardiogram showed normal left ventricular function.
